Text: why the fuck you put rar archive?
Its a passworded zip that requires you to go to a website for the code...nice touch by stacycooker don't you think.

as a nice uploader and someone who would like good acknowledgement for the work they do, would you be kind enough to include in this torrent page a password for the rar file that you want people to download from you. That way yopur friends at piratebay will not have to be subject to adware and popups.
merry christmas by the way
